question.para: Where can I post a question about TLS?

answer.para: Use one (the most appropriate) of the &osips; mailing lists:
Remember: first at all, check if your question wasn't already answered.

question.para: How can I report a bug?

answer.para: Accumulate as much as possible information (&osips; version, opensips -V output, your OS (uname -a), &osips; logs, network dumps, core dump files, configuration file) and send a mail to &osipsdevlink;
Also you may try OpenSIPS's bug report web page: http://www.opensips.org/pmwiki.php?n=Development.Tracker

question.para: How can I debug ssl/tls problems?

answer.para: Increase the log level in opensips.cfg (debug=4) and watch the log statements in syslog.
Install the ssldump utility and start it. This will give you a trace of the ssl/tls connections.
